ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: War of the Undead Gods
ComicInfo.Summary: With Kandor about to be captured by Brainiac, Zor-El and Alura send Kara in a rocket to New Genesis, unfortunately the New Gods have all been transformed into zombies. On Earth-2, with a cure for the zombie virus, the surviving heroes attempt to retrieve Kal-El from the Sun to cure him of the virus. The Green Lanterns defend Earth-2 against a threat.
